entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vaudreuil-Dorion
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
